name: Sniper Destroy Highway Crime
description:
Sniper Destroy Highway Crime is a brand new sniping game where all you have to do is hunt the targets that appear in the traffic. Here are some bad guys in their vehicles. In missions, you have to perform various tasks like shooting the vehicles or assassinating the bad guys. For the highest score, aim for the best. As you keep progressing in the levels, the quality of the guns and the zooming power of the scopes also increases. But do not worry, as the targets also get quicker and harder to attack. Shoot your enemy or they will shoot you out with their weapon firepower. Play as expert gunner take position in city rooftop, take kill to eliminate terrorist in the city.
Features:
- Realistic and modern 3D graphics
- Upgradable weapons
- Variety of cars to destroy
- Amazing modern sound effects
- Immersive gameplay physics
- Smooth realistic controls
- Amazing FPS control to be accurate while shooting.
